model

类 ReversiModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ReversiModel

  • public class ReversiModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the model of the Reversi game which is to initialize the table and place the tokens.
    作者:
    Jerry Zhu

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ReversiModel()
      This is the constructor of the model which generate a default table.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void cleanStars()
      This method will clean the stars on the table.
      java.lang.String[][] getTable()
      This method will get a current table.
      int getTableSize()
      This method will get the size of the table.
      java.lang.String getTokenAt(int row, int col)
      This method is to get a token on the table at a specific location.
      boolean isFull()
      This method will check if the current table is full or not.
      void placeB(int row, int col)
      This method is to place a B token on the table at a specific location.
      void placeStar(int row, int col)
      This method is to place a * token on the table at a specific location.
      void placeW(int row, int col)
      This method is to place a W token on the table at a specific location.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ReversiModel

        public ReversiModel()
        This is the constructor of the model which generate a default table.

    • 方法详细资料

      • placeW

        public void placeW(int row,
                   int col)
        This method is to place a W token on the table at a specific location.
        参数:
        row - The row of the token need to placed.
        col - The column of the token need to placed.

      • placeB

        public void placeB(int row,
                   int col)
        This method is to place a B token on the table at a specific location.
        参数:
        row - The row of the token need to placed.
        col - The column of the token need to placed.

      • placeStar

        public void placeStar(int row,
                      int col)
        This method is to place a * token on the table at a specific location.
        参数:
        row - The row of the token need to placed.
        col - The column of the token need to placed.

      • getTokenAt

        public java.lang.String getTokenAt(int row,
                                   int col)
        This method is to get a token on the table at a specific location.
        参数:
        row - The row location of the token need to get.
        col - The column location of the token need to get.
        返回:
        The token at the given location.

      • getTable

        public java.lang.String[][] getTable()
        This method will get a current table.
        返回:
        The current table.

      • getTableSize

        public int getTableSize()
        This method will get the size of the table.
        返回:
        The size of the table.

      • cleanStars

        public void cleanStars()
        This method will clean the stars on the table.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        This method will check if the current table is full or not.
        返回:
        A boolean variable to represent the status of the table.
